original_text:
The righteous will never be uprooted,
    but the wicked will not remain in the land.
korean_text: 의인은 영영히 이동되지 아니하여도 악인은 땅에 거하지 못하게 되느니라

sentences.original_text: The righteous will never be uprooted
but the wicked will not remain in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 악인은 그 땅에 머물지 못하리라
